Actions.Name: Love-struck
Actions.Effects: A foe of the Aesi's choice must save. On a successful save, the foe is pacified. On a failed save, the Aesi chooses itself or one of its allies. Until the end of their next turn, all other characters than the chosen character are immune to all damage and effects from the chosen foe.

Actions.Name: Donkey
Actions.Description: The Aesi marks a character in range 5. They grow donkey ears on the top of their head.
Actions.Mark: While marked, when the character uses an ability, they first roll 1d6. On a 4+, the character can choose targets as normal. On a 1-3, the Aesi chooses the target of the attack for them, which could include an ally of the target, then this effect and markends.
